alert.note: Alert for Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 6:32PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Laramie County through 715 PM MDT... At 632 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Natural Fort to 7 miles southeast of Rockport. Movement was northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheyenne, Burns, South Greeley, Hillsdale, Ranchettes, Warren AFB, Frontier Park, Whitaker, North Cheyenne, Warren Af Base, Fox Farm-College and South Greeley High. This includes the following highways... Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 1 and 35. Interstate 80 in Wyoming between mile markers 346 and 390. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in Cheyenne.

area.areaDesc: Central Laramie County; East Laramie County; South Laramie Range; South Laramie Range Foothills
